fullText:
Wild Magic Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Sorcerer, Wild Magic class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit: Evil eye of the Vistani deals damage of the same type as your current Wild Soul damage type, and the damage is equal to your Chaos Power damage bonus.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 87.
name: Wild Magic Eye
